name: Book of Demons
description: Book of Demons is a Hack & Slash Deck-building hybrid in which YOU decide the length of quests. Wield magic cards instead of weapons and slay the armies of darkness in the dungeons below the Old Cathedral. Save the terror-stricken Paperverse from the clutches of the Archdemon himself!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or Greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
